awards.text: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: London is terrorised by a vicious sex killer known as the neck tie murderer. Following the brutal slaying of his ex-wife, down-on-his-luck Richard Blaney is suspected by the police of being the killer. He goes on the run, determined to prove his innocence.
plot: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.
title: Frenzy
